src:
Suarez Cedera, Siapa yang Layak Menemani Lionel Messi-Antoine Griezmann?
05 Nov 2019, 11:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Lionel Messi dan Antoine Griezmann harus segera memperbaiki hubungan mereka demi Barcelona. Kerja sama dua pemain ini bakal jadi harapan di tengah absennya Luis Suarez.
Suarez dipastikan tidak akan bermain ketika Barca menyambut Slavia Praha pada matchday 4 Liga Champions, Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB nanti. Striker Uruguay ini menderita cedera betis lainnya, kali kedua musim ini.
Untungnya, Ernesto Valverde masih bisa mengandalkan sejumlah nama hebat. Masih ada Ousmane Dembele, Ansu Fati, dan Carles Perez, tiga pemain muda potensial.
Siapa yang bakal jadi partner Messi-Griezmann? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Suarez Injury, Who Deserves Accompanying Lionel Messi-Antoine Griezmann?
05 Nov 2019, 11:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Lionel Messi and Antoine Griezmann must immediately improve their relationship for the sake of Barcelona. The cooperation of these two players will be a hope in the midst of the absence of Luis Suarez.
Suarez will certainly not play when Barca welcomes Slavia Prague on Matchday 4 Champions League, Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs later. The Uruguayan striker suffered another calf injury, the second time this season.
Fortunately, Ernesto Valverde could still count on a number of great names. There are still Ousmane Dembele, Ansu Fati, and Carles Perez, three potential young players.
Who will be Messi-Griezmann's partner? Read below, Bolaneters!
